Question
========
The assumptions of regression include linearity, homoscedasticity, the measurement level of the variables and the absence of outliers. In a regression analysis, a residuals plot is produced. Which condition(s) can we check with this graph?

Answerlist
----------
* Linearity and homoscedasticity
* Absence of outliers and homoscedasticity
* Linearity and absence of outliers
* Linearity, homoscedasticity and absence of outliers
